results.title: Efficacy and tolerability of simvastatin (MK-733).
results.text_hl: Combination therapy caused a reduction in low-density lipoprotein cholesterol of 54 percent. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ appeared also to be a potent hypolipidemic drug in 10 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006952 @@@familial dysbetalipoproteinemia@@@.
